Title: Relates to allowing schools to still receive reimbursement for money spent to comply with state requirements if school functions are disrupted by COVID-19
Summary: Allows schools to still receive reimbursement for money spent to comply with state requirements if school functions are disrupted by COVID-19.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend chapter 507 of the laws of 1974, relating to providing for the apportionment of state monies to certain nonpublic schools, to reimburse them for their expenses in complying with certain state requirements for the administration of state testing and evaluation programs and for participation in state programs for the reporting of basic educational data, in relation to holding harmless such monies due to the COVID-19 pandemic
